mixed-citation.article-title: Kryptochroma: a new genus of bark-dwelling crab spiders (Araneae, Thomisidae)

tp:treatment-sec.p:
The male of
K. macrostyla
resembles that of
K . pentacantha
by its robust body and large size when compared to other males of the genus, and by the stout and conical RTA ( Figs 6D, F , 20C), but can be easily distinguished by their long, free and filiform embolus ( Fig. 6C, E ).
Holotype BRAZIL • ♂ ; Rio de Janeiro , Teresópolis ; C.F. Mello-Leitão leg.; MNHN 11467 .
LEGS. Legs I and II reddish-brown, coxae I and II dark-brown with yellowish stains; legs III and IV darkbrown except by the femora which are yellow on its proximal region.

Fig. 6. Male of
Kryptochroma macrostyla ( Mello-Leitão, 1929 )
gen. et comb. nov. (MZSP 15320). A . Habitus, dorsal view. B . Front. C–F . Left male palp. C, E . Ventral view. D, F . Retrolateral view.
